ja474:2.2: Khaṇaṁ muhuttañca mante na passaṁ → khaṇaṁ muhuttaṁ na maṁ tosayanti (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
ja474:3.3: Sayaṁ harī → athāharī (bj); athāhari (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja474:4.1: pure hi → pura'ssa (bj, pts-vp-pli1); purepi (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja474:5.4: atthaṁ → mā taṁ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1) | vijaheyya manto → vijaheyyu mantā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja474:10.6: punappadāhi → punappasīda (bj, pts-vp-pli1); puna sampadāhi (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja474:11.2: Tuvampi dhammena → tvampi dhammeneva (mr) | pariggahesi → paṭiggahesi (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
ja474:12.3: Kiñcāpi laddhā jīvituṁ appapañño → kicchā laddhā jīvikaṁ appapañño (bj); kicchā laddhaṁ jīvitaṁ appapañño (sya1ed, sya2ed); kicchāpi laddhā jīvikaṁ appañña (pts-vp-pli1)
